definitions.definition: A region of the forebrain located below the thalamus , forming the basal portion of the diencephalon , and functioning to regulate body temperature, some metabolic processes and governing the autonomic nervous system .

main_definition: ( neuroanatomy ) A region of the forebrain located below the thalamus , forming the basal portion of the diencephalon , and functioning to regulate body temperature, some metabolic processes and governing the autonomic nervous system .
